name: mYwindow
tag_list: people-search-engine, social-networking, mobile, search-for-people, family-networking, search-engine
description: An insanely amazing People Search Engine
overview:
mYwindow is an Insane People Search Engine & a Self networking platform where people show their creations, follow their passion & connect to their families in an insane way.

It’s 1st part, ’ People Search Engine ’ is lived with over 55 filters to search from.

  1. Imagine searching for Females between age of 12-25 who speak spanish and live in India.
  2. Imagine searching for people who have their birthdays in August and live in San Francisco and have studied from Harvard school of Business.
  3. Imagine a Student who is starting his Graduation in coming Fall at Stanford and wants to find and interact with all 60-70 people who will join him in the exact same class.
  4. Your family who speaks Mandarin, has shifted to Milan and you want to find Mandarin speaking families near your new houses’ ZIP Code.

You will get all results, and it is not possible to do this on any other platform like Google, Facebook, LinkedIn.

external_links.title: Steve Wozniak on our Integration with Foursquare
